data.name: Shiny Ninjas
data.detailed_description:
Description

2-4 local Players control one of four Shiny Ninjas with the ability to dash in any direction, during which you not only slice through the enemy ninjas, but can also pass through mysteriously magical paper lanterns, which are spread throughout the level. This grants the Shiny Ninjas access to shortcuts around the otherwise dark level and to reach hard to jump places.
Kill all other Ninjas or reach and claim their bases to become the last ninja standing.

Key Features

  • Dash forward with a Light-Infused attack, to dispose of enemies or pass through illuminated barriers
  • Your strategy must change constantly to react to and counter enemy behavior
  • Twitchy, 2-4 player PvP combat
  • Play classically during the night or battle with the sun up in our alternate game mode if your group of friends prefers pure PvP over the tactical strategies of the classic mode

"If light travels so fast, how come it's never caught a Ninja?"
